name: Syen Co: Affliction Demo
description:
Description of game:

You wake up in a testing facility, wondering where you are, figuring out how to get out with one slight problem... you are in wheelchair. With a condescending voice over mocking your intelligence and movement, how will you ever get out with your life and sanity.

Note:

As this is a demo, I would like to have some feedback for the game to improve/get ideas for the game.

To get to the next level, just reach to the end of the room where the light is.

Controls:

Moving: W/S (Up and Down Arrows)

Rotating: A/D (Left and Right Arrows)

Looking: Mouse movement

Interacting: E

Pausing: P/Esc

Edit Mode:

Movement: WASD (Arrow Keys)

Ascending/Descending: Q/E

Editing Object Height: Numpad 5/2

Editing Object Length (Only with ramp): Numpad 1/3

Rotating Object: Numpad 4/6

Placing Object: Left Mouse Click

Going through object list: Mouse Scroll-wheel/Numpad +/-

Re-selecting objects: No objects in hand, mouse over placed object

Delete Objects: Select object, then press Delete

You can view the controls in game in the pause menu.
